title: How do you use ready-up helmet ? : r/starcitizen - Reddit
body: The Ready-Up is technically a piece of clothing, iirc, and so you can't wear it with an undersuit/other armor, only other clothing. Nope. In fact it' more of a gimmick, the lore states that people wear these in Lorville to combat the huge amount of air pollution there. It's like the 2952 version of a covid mask.
readable_content:
Lord-Rufus (2022-12-08): The Ready-Up is a hat manufactured by Gyson Inc.. It is a popular budget softshell helmet made primarily of industrial-strength plastic. It barely met United Empire of Earth standards and received the lowest rating possible from Whitley’s Guide. Although it is advertised as a pressurized helmet, it does not provide any life support thus the player will suffocate when wearing one in depressurized area.

- isogyre01 (2022-12-08): The Ready-Up is technically a piece of clothing, iirc, and so you can't wear it with an undersuit/other armor, only other clothing.

- [deleted] (2022-12-08): Ok so it dose not work in zero G

- beydo12 (2022-12-08): That's the fun part - you don't

- alaskanwilly (2022-12-08): The description makes it sound like it does work in zero G, however I guess it would be more for on the ship and you lose pressure/oxygen... but yeah it reads like should work imo. Lol

- RedNozomi (2022-12-08): Presumably it works fine in zero G, just not in zero oxygen.

- [deleted] (2022-12-08): sadly the ready-up helmet doesn't make a hermetic seal with your neck / isn't airtight. So it won't work in a vacuum or a non-breathable atmosphere; even though it certainly should.
